description: This simple truffle pasta is a restaurant quality dish that is so easy to make.
name: Truffle & Mushroom Pappardelle Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Bring a large pot of water to the boil and add the pappardelle. Cook for 8 minutes, until al dente, drain and reserve 250ml of cooking water.
Heat the butter and oil in a large pan on medium high heat and cook the mushrooms for 5 minutes. Stir in the garlic and cook for 2 minutes.
Stir in the creme fraiche, parmesan and truffle oil, then add the drained pasta and a couple of splashes of starchy water and toss to coat the pasta.
Serve with extra parmesan on top and cracked black pepper.
